typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		org_id as string,
		org_name as string,
		org_emp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> outputofsouce
outputofsouce split(org_id=='1',
	org_id=='2',
	org_id=='3',
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		org_id
	)) ~> orgcndsplit@(orgid1, orgid2, orgid3, other)
orgcndsplit@orgid1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['fmcg.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
orgcndsplit@orgid2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['pharms.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
orgcndsplit@orgid3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['mkt.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink3
